ARABIC: وَإِنَّ لَهُۥ عِندَنَا لَزُلْفَىٰ وَحُسْنَ مَـَٔابٍ

ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_0: He will have nearness to Us and a good Homecoming.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_1: He has a high position with Us and an excellent abode.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_2: Indeed an exalted position of nearness awaits him and an excellent resort.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_3: In Our eyes he certainly has a high position and the best place to return.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_4: And indeed for him in Our presence are, surely, proximity and an excellent abode.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_5: And verily, for him is a near access to Us, and a good (final) return.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_6: And most surely he had a nearness to Us and an excellent resort.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_7: And he had a near place in Our presence and a fair resort.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_8: And lo! he hath favour with Us, and a happy journey's end.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_9: His reward will be nearness to Us, a good place to return to.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_10: And verily for him is an approach with us, and a happy end.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_11: Indeed he has [a station of] nearness with Us and a good destination.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_12: And he enjoyed, indeed, a Near Approach to Us, and a beautiful Place of (Final) Return.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_13: And verily, he enjoyed a near access to Us, and a good final return (Paradise).
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_14: And he has a place near to Us, and a fine return.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_15: For him is nearness to Us, and a beautiful resort.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_16: And indeed, for him is nearness to Us and a good place of return.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_17: [38:40] And indeed he has [a station of] nearness with Us and a fair resort — a similar [statement] has already appeared [in another verse above].
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_18: (And lo! he hath favour) close rank (with Us, and a happy journey's end) and a happy return in the Hereafter.
